support.intro:
Since the release of Tekken 7, the T7 Chicken team has been so inspired by the positive feedback from the Tekken community.\
    We have been working really hard on our spare time to keep everyone happy. If you would like to see the T7 Chicken brand grow and \
    contiue support for the app, we would be grateful for any support you can provide us. Here is a list of ways you can support us\
    with or without money
